item.title: AngstromCTF 2019 Secret Sheep Society | CTF Writeup
item.description: Challenge details Category Points Solves Crypto 120 98 TL;DR Spotting the weakness (AES with CBC Mode). Get token. Flipping specific bytes in session json (turn false to true ). manipulate token with flipped bytes. Send manipulated token to page. Get the flag. Challenge Description The sheep are up to no good. They have a web portal for their secret society, which we have the source for.
